result.content:
Expand All | Collapse All
 Set Up: .FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.SetUp (edit)
Import
fitnesse.fixtures

SetUp
This test makes sure that we can build a simple virtual wiki link. We create a page with a !contents widget and then set the virtual wiki property to point to .FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage. When we fetch the page that !contents should show the ChildOne page that is below .FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage.

Page creator.
Page name. Page contents. Page attributes. valid?
VirtualPage !contents VirtualWiki=http://localhost:8080/FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.AcceptanceTestPage true

Response Requester.
uri valid?
VirtualPage true

Response Examiner
type pattern matches? wrapped html?
contents ChildOne true   
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: 4529
Connection: close
Server: FitNesse-v20100403
Cache-Control: max-age=0
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8

<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">
<html>
	<head>
		<title>VirtualPage</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse.css" media="screen"/>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse_print.css" media="print"/>
		<script src="/files/javascript/fitnesse.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
	</head>
	<body>
		<div class="sidebar">
			<div class="art_niche" onclick="document.location='FrontPage'"></div>
			<div class="actions">
				<!--Edit button-->
				<a href="VirtualPage?edit" accesskey="e">Edit</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Properties button-->
				<a href="VirtualPage?properties" accesskey="p">Properties</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Refactor button-->
				<a href="VirtualPage?refactor" accesskey="r">Refactor</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Where Used button-->
				<a href="VirtualPage?whereUsed" accesskey="w">Where Used</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Search button-->
				<a href="?searchForm" accesskey="s">Search</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Files button-->
				<a href="/files" accesskey="f">Files</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Versions button-->
				<a href="VirtualPage?versions" accesskey="v">Versions</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Recent Changes button-->
				<a href="/RecentChanges" accesskey="">Recent Changes</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--User Guide button-->
				<a href=".FitNesse.UserGuide" accesskey="">User Guide</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Test History button-->
				<a href="?testHistory" accesskey="">Test History</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="mainbar">
			<div class="header">
				<br/>
<span class="page_title">VirtualPage</span>
<a style="font-size:small;" onclick="popup('addChildPopup')"> [add child]</a>			</div>
			<div class="main"><div class="toc1">
	<div class="contents">
		<b>Contents:</b>
		<ul>
			<li>
				<a href="VirtualPage.ChildOne">
					<i>ChildOne</i>
				</a>
			</li>
			<li>
				<a href="VirtualPage.ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentPage">
					<i>ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentPage</i>
				</a>
			</li>
			<li>
				<a href="VirtualPage.ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentSubPage">
					<i>ChildWithAliasLinkToNonExistentSubPage</i>
				</a>
			</li>
			<li>
				<a href="VirtualPage.ChildWithLinkToNonExistentPage">
					<i>ChildWithLinkToNonExistentPage</i>
				</a>
			</li>
			<li>
				<a href="VirtualPage.ChildWithSubPageLinkToNonExistentPage">
					<i>ChildWithSubPageLinkToNonExistentPage</i>
				</a>
			</li>
			<li>
				<a href="VirtualPage.IncludedPage">
					<i>IncludedPage</i>
				</a>
			</li>
			<li>
				<a href="VirtualPage.IncludingPage">
					<i>IncludingPage</i>
				</a>
			</li>
		</ul>
	</div>
</div>
<br/>
<div class="footer">
</div>
<div id="addChildPopup" class="popup_window">
  <div class="popup_title">Add Child Page to VirtualPage</div>
  <div class="popup_content">
    <form action="VirtualPage" method="get">
      <input type="hidden" name="responder" value="addChild"/>
      <table style="white-space:normal" border="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" height="100%">
        <tr>
          <td>
            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Normal"/>Normal<br/>

            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Test"/>Test<br/>

            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Suite"/>Suite<br/>

            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Default" checked="checked"/>Default<br/>

          </td>
          <td>
            <table border="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td><label for="childName">Name</label></td>
                <td><input size="50" id="childName" type="text" name="name"/></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td><label for="childContent">Content</label></td>
                <td><input size="50" id="childContent" type="text" name="content" value="!contents"/></td>
              </tr>
            </table>
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td></td>
          <td>
            <input TYPE="button" VALUE="Cancel" onClick="popdown('addChildPopup')"/>
            <input value="Add" type="submit"/>
          </td>
        </tr>
      </table>
    </form>
  </div>
</div></div>
		</div>
	</body>
</html>

 Tear Down: .FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.TearDown (edit)

tear down
